View Javadoc
1   package com.quorum.tessera.thirdparty;
2   
3   import com.quorum.tessera.api.filter.IPWhitelistFilter;
4   import com.quorum.tessera.app.TesseraRestApplication;
5   import com.quorum.tessera.config.AppType;
6   import java.util.Set;
7   import java.util.stream.Collectors;
8   import java.util.stream.Stream;
9   
10  import javax.ws.rs.ApplicationPath;
11  
12  /** The third party API */
13  @ApplicationPath("/")
14  public class ThirdPartyRestApp extends TesseraRestApplication {
15  
16      @Override
17      public Set<Object> getSingletons() {
18  
19          IPWhitelistFilter iPWhitelistFilter = new IPWhitelistFilter();
20          RawTransactionResource rawTransactionResource = new RawTransactionResource();
21  
22          return Stream.of(iPWhitelistFilter, rawTransactionResource).collect(Collectors.toSet());
23      }
24  
25      @Override
26      public AppType getAppType() {
27          return AppType.THIRD_PARTY;
28      }
29  }
